corr_matrix_diff = train_df.drop("song_popularity", axis = 1).corr() - test_df.corr()

plt.figure(figsize = (16, 12))
sns.heatmap(corr_matrix_diff.round(3), annot = True, cmap = "YlGnBu")
plt.show()

plt.show()
